ShortDescription.Value: Change the brands assigned to each buildings

Publish.LongDescription:
# Company Brand Changer Company Brand Changer is a purely cosmetic mod that allows you to change the visual brand of any building in your city that currently houses a company. With just a few clicks, swap out logos, signs, and branding styles on commercial, industrial or office buildings to better fit to your vision.
Note: This mod does not affect the building's underlying company or function. For example, an "Office_Bank" producing "Financial" will continue to do so, even if an "Electronics" brand is assigned. Only the visual branding and selected building colors updates — the simulation remains unchanged.
Features: * **Change Building Brands**: Access any building with a company, and instantly switch its brand. * **Building Seed Randomization**: A bonus feature that let's you randomize the building's seed — reshuffling the colors and props like trees, fences, and billboards.
Recommended Brand Packs: * [Real World Brand: Adobe](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/83168/Windows) * [Real World Brand: Apple](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/86423/Windows) * [Real World Brand: Discord](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/84186/Windows) * [Real World Brand: Paradox Interactive](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80939/Windows) * [Real World Brand: Petrochemicals](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/81625/Windows)
